name: enthuse
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I ] to express excitement about something or great interest in it: He was enthusing over a wonderful restaurant he'd been to. [ + speech ] "She's the best leader that this country has ever known!" he enthused.
[ T ] to get other people to share your excitement and interest in a particular subject: enthuse someone (with something) He was passionately interested in classical music but failed to enthuse his children (with it).
